Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class Engine::Vector2< T >

Template class for a vector class with two dimensions.

Member Function Documentation

double length (  )  [inline]

Returns the length of the vector (sqrt(x^2 + y^2)).

Returns:
The length of the vector.

Vector2 normalize (  )  [inline]

Sets the length of the vector to 1 - meaning it becomes a unit vector.

Note:
Use this carefully when using vectors of integer type because rounding errors are as good as guaranteed.
Returns:
A copy of the normalized vector.

bool isInRect ( double  left,
double  top,
double  right,
double  bottom 
) [inline]

A shortcut function to check wether this vector is inside a rectangle - if we consider it a position vector (origin in (0,0), end-point at (x,y)).

Parameters:
left Left side of the rectangle.
top Top side of the rectangle.
right Right side of the rectangle.
bottom Bottom side of the rectangle.
Returns:
True if the position vector is considered inside the specified rectangle. False otherwise.
